definitions.definition: A recorded sequence of images displayed on a screen at a rate sufficiently fast to create the appearance of motion; a film .
examples: He is watching a crime-thriller movie .
definitions.label_groups: chiefly Canada , US , Australia , New Zealand
usually in the plural , chiefly Canada , US , Australia , New Zealand

definitions.definition: Any event , especially one that is unpleasant or tiresome .
examples: Don't worry; this isn't the first time I've been through this movie .

definitions.definition: An extremely fun and exciting experience.
examples: Every night with you is a movie !

main_definition: ( chiefly Canada , US , Australia , New Zealand ) A recorded sequence of images displayed on a screen at a rate sufficiently fast to create the appearance of motion; a film .
secondary_definitions: ( usually in the plural , chiefly Canada , US , Australia , New Zealand ) A cinema ; a movie theatre .
( informal , figuratively ) Any event , especially one that is unpleasant or tiresome .
( slang , figuratively ) An extremely fun and exciting experience.
